newsitem.title: USA: KCBT wheat surges late on fund buying in May, July.
newsitem.headline: KCBT wheat surges late on fund buying in May, July.

text.p: KCBT hard red winter wheat futures rallied in fast, late trade on fund buying in the May and July contracts, traders said.
"Fund's are buying the May and the July, and March is just following," a trader said. "It's a break-out."
At 1307 CST, KCBT wheat was 5-1/2 to 10 cents per bushel higher, with March up 10 cents at $4.32. May was up 8-1/2 cents at $4.04-1/2.
Charts showed the last time KCBT March wheat traded above $4.32 was Sept 26, 1996, when March traded as high as $4.32-1/2 before settling at $4.27-1/2.
